name: Never Go To A Mall After Closing
name_original: Never Go To A Mall After Closing
description:
NEVER GO TO A MALL AFTER CLOSING Short Created by @Jonniemadeit

One night after staying late at the mall, you find yourself alone being stalked by unknown creatures.

Watch the Cutscene in the Game-Menu before playing.

Original creepy pasta story by: Anonymous 

Intro excerpt from Narrated by: Mr. Freaky

Please Note: This game was created as quick project, I started getting uninspired quickly after development started. Instead of gathering dust on my hard-drive I thought I'd publish it.
